meanings.sent1: I sorted the recyclables into different bins.
meanings.sent2: The city collects recyclables every Tuesday.
meanings.sent3: The recyclables were so excited to be turned into something new.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a treasure trove of recyclables waiting to be transformed.
meanings.sent5: The recyclables clinked together like a symphony of possibilities.

meanings.definition: Materials that can be reused or processed to create new products.
meanings.sent1: The factory purchased recyclables to make eco-friendly products.
meanings.sent2: Recyclables help reduce waste and protect the environment.
meanings.sent3: The recyclables whispered stories of their past lives as they awaited their transformation.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a warehouse of recyclables, ready to be repurposed into innovative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The recyclables gleamed with potential under the bright lights of the recycling plant.
